sn22.73:1.2: “Assutava, bhikkhave, puthujjano rupassa assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
sn22.73:1.6: vinnanassa assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
sn22.73:1.7: Sutava ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako rupassa assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati.
sn22.73:1.11: vinnanassa assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati”ti.
